wikipedia_page.main: Kenneth Edgar Bennett (2 October 1921 – December 1994) was an English professional footballer who scored 50 goals from 187 appearances in the Football League playing for Southend United, Bournemouth & Boscombe Athletic, Brighton & Hove Albion and Crystal Palace.

response: Ken Bennett (born 1959) is an American politician.
Ken Bennett may also refer to:
* Ken Bennett (Australian footballer) (born 1940), played for Collingwood
* Ken Bennett (English footballer) (1921–1994), played for Southend United, Bournemouth, Brighton & Hove Albion, Crystal Palace
